channel.title: CVE Feed for Sophos -- Sophos Email Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sophos -- Sophos Email Appliance

item.title: CVE-2021-36806|2024-08-04T01:01:59.782Z -- sophos -- sophos%20email%20appliance
item.description:
A reflected XSS vulnerability allows an open redirect when the victim clicks a malicious link to an error page on
Sophos Email Appliance
older than version 4.5.3.4.
